response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This extraordinary creation boasts unparalleled features and capabilities that set it apart from any other offerings on the market. With its innovative design, exceptional performance, and cutting-edge technology, this product promises to deliver immense value to its users. Given its unique attributes and market positioning, we believe it is worth more than $1,000,000. Considering its potential impact and the investment required to bring it to market, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a limited-time offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both parties. Let's discuss how we can make this happen.", "product_price": 950000}
